He also asserted Google must focus on the development of technology that allows people to use their phones to do financial transactions. Phones, as we know, are used as banks in many poorer parts of the world- and modern technology means that their use as financial tools can go much further than that, he wrote. Finally, Eric Schmidt said Google would like to make inexpensive smartphones available to the most destitute regions of the planet.
